name: Domessa
description: Even after experiencing the dangers of this world, he still loves this planet, to the point of giving up his life in exchange for its future.

passiveSkill.name: Post-Impressionism
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Domessa always strives for perfection in art. Every normal attack or special skill grants a shield which has {placeholder} of Max HP and increases DMG RES Rate by {placeholder} for 2 rounds.Lineup Skill:Activation Requirement: Leader is Light Paladin or Spirit Healer.Activation Effect: When Domessa joins the battle, transfers damage received by Leader to self and reduces damage by 50% for 20 seconds."}

uniqueSkill.name: Heavenly Ward
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Stars gather and form a giant shield to protect Domessa. Domessa gains a shield that cannot be dispelled or stolen, with {placeholder} Block Rate and {placeholder} of Max HP for 2 rounds. Successfully blocking stuns the attacker for 1 round."}

specialSkill.name: Wild Color
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Domessa injects her passion into her painting, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage to a single enemy and gaining a shield with {placeholder} of Max HP for 1 round.Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Inspiration Strike
normalSkill.description: Inspiration strikes and Domessa takes up her brush, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage to a single enemy.
